page.title: 08Family Life
page.content: My name is{Helen Richardson}and I am 10 years old.I live in Halifax.At 7am I get up and wash.Then I get dressed. At 8.40am we leave for school.We have assembly on Mondays.I stop in school for lunch.We have a playtime at 10.35am and 12pm.At 3.25pm I go home.I normally have sandwiches for tea.Then I go to Brownies at Shibden Park.It is 8pm when I get in so I watch TV until 9pm which is my bedtime. {A day in the Whiteley house. My mum takes me to school in the car. At 3.30pm my sister and my brother come home from Catholic High School and my mum comes to pick me up.Then she goes to fetch my dad from work.I go out to play for about half an hour. Then I come in,watch TV and go to bed at 9.30pm
